210929.ジュエル鑑定した アイテムは\nたからばこから 入手できます。<auto_br=:
You can obtain Jewel-appraised items from
the treasure chest.<auto_br=20000>

338828.<speed=0>\nこの冒険の書は\n物語スキップが できるようだ。:
<speed=0>
You can skip the story with
this Adventure Log.

338830.<speed=0>\n物語スキップとは おはなしを\n遊びたいバージョンの開幕ま:
This Adventure Log will allow you to skip ahead to the beginning of the latest version's story.
If you'd like to catch up to the latest story, then it's recommended to use this.
Any story that you skip will be deemed clear and cannot be replayed. Please keep this in mind before deciding.
Additionally, you will not gain any story or quest completion rewards, with some exceptions.
Items with fixed amounts such as Skill Books, Jade Keys, or stat seeds will be received as part of this exception.

338831.<speed=0>\nスキップした おはなしは クリア済みになり\n後から 遊び:
Any story that you skip will be deemed clear and cannot be replayed.
If you'd like to read up on past stories, you can use ""The Story So Far"" located under the "Records" menu.
Also, the cutscenes of the story you skipped can be viewed in a Memory Projector.

338832.<speed=0>\nおはなしを進めるために 必要なクエストは\nクリア済みにな:
<speed=0>
Quests necessary to completed for the main
story will be cleared. You can view the
official website for more information.
<speed=0>
Dragon Quest X Awakening Adventurer's Square
https://sqex.to/exskip<bw_break>

338833.<speed=0>\nストーリー報酬と クエストクリア報酬は\n一部の例外を除き:
You will not earn any story or quest completion rewards, with some exceptions.
Items with fixed amounts such as Skill Books, Jade Keys, or stat seeds will be received as part of this exception.
Additionally, you may purchase equipment from various shops. For more information, please visit the official website.
Dragon Quest X Awakening Adventurer's Square https://sqex.to/exskip

338834.<speed=0>\nおはなしを進めることで 手に入る\nだいじなものが 追加さ:
You will obtain various Key Items as you progress through the story.
Additionally, any Key Items that you must forfeit due to story progression will be recorded in your Records.

338835.<speed=0>\nボスモンスターの 討伐履歴\nストーリークリアで獲得できる:
<speed=0>
Defeated boss monsters, earned accolades,
and obtained Key Items from the story will
all be recorded in your Records.<bw_break>

338836.<speed=0>\nおはなしを進めるために 以下のコンテンツは\n進められた状:
To progress the story, the following content may be unlocked in an in-progress state.
・Illusia's Sketchbook ・Memories of Yuliza
